plot: At the age of 3, alicia starts taking polaroids of everything that happens in her life. When she turns 20, she decides to analyse where this obsession for photography comes from, and makes a review of her memory, her photographs.
title: Sinécdoque
plot_es: At the age of 3, alicia starts taking polaroids of everything that happens in her life. When she turns 20, she decides to analyse where this obsession for photography comes from, and makes a review of her memory, her photographs.
